## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b472262aeae5dc88c4a9ace28e80c4b0161d1624bcc9a9e148fc7c8e1069ff06)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'shopify-ecommerce-shopping-cart' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
